Addon.name: BidHelper
Addon.author: Anders 'sarf' Kronquist
Addon.email: k AT fukt DOT bth DOT se
Addon.Description: BidHelper is a little addon that will look for bid-messages from the auction house and put them in a little temporary storage. It adds a button on the minimap that, when moused over, shows the last 5 messages, and if clicked all messages since a few hours back.
